biocontainers.name: hapflk
biocontainers.summary: hapflk is a software implementing the hapFLK and FLK tests for the detection of selection signatures based on multiple population genotyping data.

biotools.summary: Software for the detection of selection signatures based on multiple population genotyping data.

bioschemas.name: hapFLK
bioschemas.summary: Software for the detection of selection signatures based on multiple population genotyping data.
